content: farm beanie a quick hat plain enough to please the by average bloke but interesting enough to keep the knitter happy i createdthis for allison britt my farming uncle to keep his headwarm on frosty mornings © sparrowplay © sparrowplay sizes head circumference 41-46-51-56-61 cm /16-18-20-22-24 approximately baby - toddler - child- small adult - large adult hat is initially snug but loosens
